body:
Day 9 - Manga 108
The art ain't half bad and, like I said, coloring gives some extra points, if done at least in a way that makes them seem like humans and not a purple mass of flesh.
3/10.
The art style is bad and the ending made me laugh, but yeah, this is garbage 2/10
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.
